text.p: Gemstar International Group Ltd and StarSight Telecast Inc on Thursday said the companies' shareholders have approved their merger.
The merger is expected to close in the next few days, at which time StarSight shareholders will receive 0.6062 ordinary Gemstar shares for each StarSight common share owned.

Options and convertible securities of StarSight Telecast will be exercisable or convertible for Gemstar ordinary shares at the same exchange ratio as StarSight common stock. StarSight Telecast will become a wholly owned Gemstar unit.
StarSight Telecast develops and markets the StarSight interactive program guide, an on-screen TV program guide that offers viewers a way to find, select and record TV programs.
Gemstar develops, markets and licenses proprietary technologies and systems aimed at making technology user-friendly for consumers.

Gemstar's VCR Plus+ system is a standard for VCR programming. It allows a user to record a television show simply by entering a number, called the PlusCode number, printed in television program guides.
